member.summary: Iterates through its internal list of SevenSegDigits and sets the number.
member.param: Number to be set on SevenSegDigits.
member.remarks: Throws an exception if there is too many digits. Sets leading zeros.

member.param: String representing a number to be displayed. Leading zeros please.

member.summary: Retrieves the number of SevenSegDigits stored.

member.summary: An obtuse way of telling the parent thread that a reset should happen.

member.summary: An obtuse way of letting the parent thread know that there's an error. Gets reset on read.

member.summary: An obtuse way of sending an error message to the parent thread. Gets reset on read.

member.summary: An obtuse way of sending the price to the parent thread.

member.summary: An obtuse way of letting the parent know the socket is open.

member.summary: An obtuse way of sending server goodbye data to the parent thread.

member.summary: Connects to the host

member.name: M:FuelPump.SocketCommunicator.PollServer
member.summary: Gets a new message from the server and process it.
member.remarks: NO error checking; bad messages are simply ignored.

member.summary: Update the server with what the user has pumped
member.param: Price at which the pump is pumping (may differ as price is not updated while pumping)
